attributes.additional_details: The doctors, nurses, ambulance staff and all NHS personnel throughout the land have more than demonstrated their worth, their commitment and their dedication to the welfare of the nation as a whole.  I implore the government of the UK, to reward these brave heroes with an increase in their wages and public recognition of their unwavering dedication to services to the country.  Kenan Hudaverdi
attributes.background: In a time of national crisis, the nation’s front line defence is the NHS and they have been magnificent in their response to the Covid-19 pandemic, putting their own lives at risk in order to save lives

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004

Pay Covid-19 allowance to NHS doctors and nurses equal to 30% of salary: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552365

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256
